replies.body:
"Who’s your favorite playmaking support and **why is it Thresh**?"
well I guess it is Thresh

i disagree with u 

i think its thresh

> [{quoted}](name=mihonaco,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=tI8qY4p9,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-19T15:31:16.301+0000)
>
> i disagree with u 
> 
> i think its thresh

You have a valid point there, but let's all be real here for a second. **Thresh** can make much more flashy plays than _Thresh_
Guys, guys, you're all wrong. The best support is **Thresh**.
no I think its draaaaaaaaaaven
As a support. Yup, a support.

Hard CC? Check.
Damage? Check.
Draaaaaaaven? Check.
Death IS the best cc...
But have you considered Thresh?
{{champion:266}}
You are all wrong. I think it's Thresh.

Sounds like something... {{champion:119}} would say...
"Whos your favorite adc, and why is it Draaaaaaaaaaaaven?"

My favorite support is Jhin. With the first half of the medallion it allows me to roam lanes and snowball them without worry for farm. Well placed shots can change everything. You don't have to play traditional supports to do well; only the most skilled may truly express themselves...
i remember when i was new at this game. i thought graves support was good.. and that ghost walk made you invisible.
As a support? {{champion:202}} <-- this guy is not a support.
Just about anyone can be a support if played right...
I've played Jhin in all lanes and he's good
These {{champion:412}} hooks.. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
Those hooks are insane
That hook thru the minion wave is fucking insane.

Rito, I'm disappointed.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}  I've been with you since season 2 and have to admit it's been fun and enjoyable thus far. However I'd like to say you've come up short this time. I trusted you, looked up you to, even worshiped you when I had no idea what to do. Now it seems like that'll never happen again. The witty community will stand behind me on this when I say it's the "{{summoner:4}} -y Outflay Party."{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Wifesteal op
I thought I was at least a decent thresh... My eyes have been opened!
But.. I like Bard and Nami. :c
That {{champion:202}}  at 2:46, that username. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I know, right? Nobody has usernames like that anymore.

Rayskat has some serious knowledge of {{champion:412}} hook hitboxes to be able to pull of some of those hooks while missing the creeps like that!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
I was too distracted by people clicking on the lantern to notice the thresh hooks.

I should be suprized that the dark-hearted Chain Warden won over the "Van Hellsing" Purifier....
